alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 05 at 5:46AM EDT until October 05 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Middlesex, Northern New London, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
